thread.section_title: ProBikeKit (New Zealand) Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ProBikeKit (New Zealand) | probikekit.co.nz
thread.title: Shayne Thomson
thread.title_full: ProBikeKit (New Zealand) reviewed by Shayne Thomson

author: Shayne Thomson
title: Shayne Thomson
text:
Ordered 2 cycling bib shorts online on the 6.3.17 to see only one was dispatched, was not tolled the other one was not in stock it was when i ordered it online for days i was wondering what was happening with second pair.
To this dated 21.3.17 have not been tolled when second pair will be sent so now have cancelled order for second pair not a great service.
I still have not got the first pair an today is the 21.3.17
No communication is a big problem
